articles.title: European markets jump as Russia-Ukraine volatility persists; Stoxx 600 up 3%; Polymetal up 26% - CNBC
articles.description: European markets are set to climb on Wednesday as investors continue to monitor surging commodities prices and the ongoing war in Ukraine.
articles.content:
LONDON European markets were sharply higher on Wednesday as investors continued to monitor surging commodity prices and the ongoing war in Ukraine.

articles.author: From CNN's Beijing bureau
articles.title: Xi says China is willing to play role in mediating Ukraine crisis, in call with European leaders - CNN
articles.description: President Xi Jinping said Tuesday that China is willing to "work actively" with the international community to mediate the war in Ukraine, but did not offer details and reiterated his opposition to Western sanctions against Russia.

articles.title: Winners take all: in some markets, Ukraine war sparks boom - Reuters
articles.description: From European banks to the Polish zloty, Moscow's invasion of Ukraine has triggered massive price falls as well as a number of winners in assets that investors are racing to stock up on.
